alert.note: Alert for Eastern Uinta Mountains (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued December 25 at 2:59AM MST until December 27 at 5:00AM MST by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING THROUGH LATE SUNDAY NIGHT ABOVE 8500 FEET... * WHAT...Heavy snow possible above 8500 feet. Total snow accumulations of 6 to 12 inches possible. Winds could gust as high as 50 mph. * WHERE...Eastern Uinta Mountains. * WHEN...From this evening through late Sunday night. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The cold wind chills as low as 25 below zero could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes. A detailed map of the snowfall can be found at: www.weather.gov/gjt/winter.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.
